item.title: How do i port forward for my wireless router
item.dc:creator: @robbert_ownz robbert ownz
item.description:
@robbert_ownz wrote:

first of all i dont wanna be admin on ur server but this is how u do it.

1st make sure u have a no-ip and a server source
2nd open up ur security in system tools on start
3rd. click on firewall at bottom of of security center and you see a thing at top saying general,exceptions and advancedâ€¦
4th click on exceptions and you see a thing saying add port click on it.
5th then you will see a thing asking for name and port, put ur server name u want and port on there and click ok.
6th go on moparscape and register ur own server.
7th you are good to go.

make sure u use the port from ur server source.

hope i helped:)

Read full topic
